name: Splitbee Analytics
summary: Lightweight analytics with funnels and events, popular among indie hackers who want quick insights without enterprise overhead.

name: Railway.app
summary: Deploy backends, workers, and databases with almost zero DevOps. Great for quickly shipping prototypes and SaaS backends.

name: Clerk Auth
summary: Drop-in authentication and user management for React / Next.js apps, with social logins and session handling built-in.

name: Dub.co
summary: Beautiful open-source link shortener for modern SaaS products, with branded domains and analytics.

name: Cron Jobs by Trigger.dev
summary: Background jobs and scheduled tasks for TypeScript apps. Ideal for email digests, billing cycles, and async workflows.

name: Tally Forms
summary: Notion-style form builder with generous free tier, used for waitlists, feedback, and lightweight lead capture.

name: Plausible Analytics
summary: Privacy-friendly analytics with a simple dashboard, good for founders who want quick read on traffic and conversions.

name: Liveblocks
summary: Real-time presence, cursors, and multiplayer editing for your app. Great fit for Notion-like collaborative tools.

name: Lemon Squeezy
summary: Payments, subscriptions, and tax handling for SaaS and digital products. Popular Stripe alternative for solo devs.

name: Typedream
summary: No-code website builder with Notion-like editing, used by indie hackers for quick landing pages and link-in-bio sites.

name: Raycast AI
summary: Command palette meets AI copilot on the desktop. Useful for developers to automate workflows and quick prompts.

name: Typedesk
summary: Text snippet manager for support, sales and founders who send lots of repeated messages.

name: Bannerbear
summary: Auto-generate social images, banners and marketing visuals via API — fits perfectly with Product Hunt launch workflows.

name: Arc Browser Boosts
summary: Custom Boosts (mini-userscripts) that modify any website UI and workflow. Popular among power users and indie builders.

name: Cron Calendar
summary: Modern calendar for busy founders, helps coordinate launches, content schedules, and meetings.

name: Typedream Memberships
summary: Gate content and features behind paywalls without writing backend code, aimed at creators and micro-SaaS.

name: Turso
summary: SQLite databases at the edge. Low-latency data for global users, with a developer-friendly DX.

name: Typedream Docs
summary: Documentation sites for SaaS products, built on the same no-code stack as Typedream.

name: Whop
summary: Marketplace and infra for selling communities, digital products and SaaS access — used heavily by solo builders.

name: Typedream AI Sections
summary: Generate landing page sections with AI, then edit them visually. Good for fast iteration on marketing copy.
